message: no, sounds LOST-like from the twitternets
I don't think I see any similarities. the only show it vaguely reminded me of was The 4400.
y'all seen this show yet? there's zombies and shit.
since im sick this weekend gonna try to check it out
because you might be patient 0 of the zombie apocalypse?
I've never enjoyed lost, but I tore through the first season in a night with my roommates.  Sooo fun.
First season of the walking dead that is, not lost
hah, I was wondering
We did that with LOST though
watched the whole first season
i highly recommend
The Walking Dead has to be one of my favorite shows now. I can't wait until 2nd season!
me too
The comics are good. I was miffed that the Walking dead wasn't available on Hulu
lost interest when I couldn't watch more than the first episode
hello all, I saw that 1st season of Walking Dead, to me have a fair drama no much action..but lets see if the 2nd season is better =)
Enjoyed the 1st season but something tells me it's going to go the way of Heroes.  How much mileage is there in a zombie series?  Would love to be wrong!
The first season was excellent. Great show. I love that it's not just all about avoiding the zombies, there's a little personal intrigue as well.
I thought it started off strong, then meandered, then went way weird in the finale. Kind of worried it's following the "Heroes" trajectory, a show I'm now embarrassed to admit I once liked.

It's way too predictible, like most of post-apocalyptic shows. Unlike heroes it seems to follow a more realistic path, let's hope they won't fall into the "our scenario is inconsistant, let's add some weird/improbable/easy magical trick to get it right".

I've really enjoyed the first season. I was excited to see a zombie show that looks like it could actually work. i'm keeping my fingers crossed for season 2. It's not on FOX so there's a good chance it will live. :) The biggest problem with Heroes was that it got too much interference from Fox, IMO.
@romain I take it you haven't seen the comic book?
Not yet, planning to though. Maybe it will help...

I thought the first couple of episodes started off strong, and then it just slowly began to lose my attention. The "Vatos" episode completely lost me, and I never picked back up. I may try watching a little more if it hits Netflix Instant Queue.
I can't wait for season 2.  I thought the first season was awesome.
@romain it most definitely will. the story is STILL going on. you won't be disappointed.
Very much enjoyed season 1, but from what i know from the comics, i worry about the coming seasons.  I wish all shows were made with TWD's quality though, visually it was beautiful
yea i can't wait for season 2 but remember they fired all the writers from season 1 so i am think either new direction which would be bad or it will just get lazy i hope not :(
@italiano40 I hadn't known this. Do you know why they were fired?
@JohnFail no idea none was stand I am using my iPhone but of google it you can find the articles on it
